Articles.Content:
What the mod name that puts realistic planets ?

Like this :

 ![kerbal1.jpg](http://gamingportugal.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/kerbal1.jpg)

[Real Solar System](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55145-0-23-WIP-Alpha-Real-Solar-System-v5-5-KSP23-fix-12-23-13), but I don't think it's updated for 1.0 (yet?).

Moving this to General Add-on Affairs, the place for all your mod-related questions. Welcome aboard!

Actually, judging from the curvature of the planet at that height, I think he only meant cosmetically.

That screenshot is either Astronomer's Pack or the Renaissance compilation, not sure which.

Also, [duplicate thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117627-KSP-Mod-for-planets-realistic).

Real solar system adds real planets, however I'm pretty sure the picture is just one of the 'graphics' mods.

Try googling better atmospheres or the astronomers visual pack. Not sure if they're up to date with 1.0 yet though.
